name: Va
description:
In “Va” the only enemy is yourself. Just kidding. It’s this cabin and the mess in it. Interacting with the mess cleans it up. Throughout “Va” the player will face challenges such as cleaning the dishes and setting up the table. The player is accompanied by a guide. Is it a spiritual guide? No one really knows but she’s there and she’s talking. Journey in “Va” and find yourself. Find what this cabin means to you. 

Va is based on a short segment of the game “The Beginners Guide”

Made in 3 days as a submission for a class in Unity.
